list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: under his arm he carried a large portfolio of drawings

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: relating to, denoting, or engaged in an employment pattern that involves a succession of short-term contracts and part-time work, rather than the more traditional model of a long-term single job.
